ValidationRule.description: Markets Approached Req'd at Proposal Received (Multi-Picklist)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && NOT(OR($RecordType.Name = "Health & Benefits", $RecordType.Name = "Scale", $RecordType.Name = "FS Direct")) &&
AND(
NOT( ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c , "New Business - BOR")),
ISBLANK(TEXT( Billing__c )), ISCHANGED( StageName ) ,
ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Proposal Approved/Closed Won"))
